sentences.en: ...the U.S. Plenipotentiary to the UN conference.
sentences.cn: ...美国在联合国大会的全权代表。

sentences.en: Edwin H. Conger was envoy extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary.
sentences.cn: 埃德温·H.康格是特命全权公使。

sentences.en: From right: Minister Plenipotentiary of the Embassy of the Syrian Arab Republic, Interpreter Wang Qian.
sentences.cn: 右起: 叙利亚共和国驻华大使馆全权公使纳瓦夫·卡利特, 翻译王茜.

sentences.en: She became Her Britannic Majesty's new ambassador plenipotentiary to the Republic of Lebanon.
sentences.cn: 她成为了英国女王陛下驻黎巴嫩共和国的新任全权大使。

words.tran_cn: 充分地；完全地；有全权地

trans.tran_en: An ambassador plenipotentiary or minister plenipotentiary has full power or authority to represent their country
someone who has full power to take action or make decisions, especially as a representative of their government in a foreign country
